fieldUpdates.name: Check box after expire email - 7 day

fieldUpdates.description: Defaults Express Expiration Date to 5 days
fieldUpdates.name: Default Express Expiration Date

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(TEXT(Type)= "Revenue Opportunity", DATE(YEAR(CloseDate) + floor((month(CloseDate)+ License_Term__c -1)/12), mod(month(CloseDate)+(License_Term__c-1),12)+1, Day(CloseDate))-1,License_End_Date__c)
fieldUpdates.name: License End Date

fieldUpdates.description: If a return is $0 and not a Remorse Refund, move the return to Refunded Closed automatically when it hits finance processing.
fieldUpdates.name: Move Return to Refunded Closed

fieldUpdates.description: Resets Free Trial Approval to false after an approval request is approved, rejected, or recalled, allowing AEs to submit another trial extension request.
fieldUpdates.name: Reset Free Trial Approval
Set License Term Status to Approved
Set License Term Status to Pending
Set License Term Status to Rejected

fieldUpdates.description: This updates the Free Trial end date for a Free Trial return Oppty to add 30 days
fieldUpdates.name: Update Free Trial End Date
Update MX Approval status to approved

fieldUpdates.description: Updates RTN Oppty Name to standardized name
fieldUpdates.name: Update RTN Oppty Name

fieldUpdates.description: Updates oppty stage to decision. Used to trigger midmarket generation
fieldUpdates.name: Update Stage
Update Transfer Order Push to NS
Update Trial End Date for Ent Approval
Update Trial End Date for Indus Approval
Update Trial End Date for MM Approval

rules.fullName: 12 Month Rev Oppty - Non Commissionable SKU
rules.description: Email alert for when a 12 month oppty goes into closing to the salesops alias.
rules.formula: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Revenue Opportunity"), Renewal__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closing"), First_Purchase__c = TRUE, Finance_Segment__c = "Mid Market", (OR(ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Country__c,"United States"),ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Country__c,"Canada"))), License_Term__c = 12 ) )

AND(CONTAINS( Owner.UserRole.Name , 'Fleet'), CONTAINS( Owner.UserRole.Name , 'AE1'), NOT(ISBLANK( Account.CS_POC_Email_Address__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( Account.CS_POC_First_Name__c )), First_Purchase__c = TRUE, ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Orders Processing'))

rules.fullName: Amend Oppty was created on Active Renewal
rules.description: Amend Oppty was created on Active Renewal
rules.formula: NOT(ISNULL(SBQQ__AmendedContract__c))

rules.fullName: Amount Received field filled out and auto email is sent to the AE%2E
rules.formula: AND(ISCHANGED(Amount_Received__c ),(!(ISNULL(Amount_Received__c ))),($Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator API'),(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Revenue Opportunity")),ISBLANK(Payment_Token__c),NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closing")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Orders Processing")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Ready to Ship")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Won")))
AND(ISPICKVAL(Rebate_Type__c, 'Buyout'), ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Refunded - Closed'), ISPICKVAL(Buyout_Stage__c,'No Documentation'))

rules.description: Email from buyouts@samsara.com to notify AE that a EFT Requested (Electronic Funds Transfer)
Email letting AE and AE Manager the buyout is approved and check tracking number.
Email from buyouts@samsara.com to notify AE of invalid buyout documentation
When a Channel Oppty gets Closed Lost

rules.fullName: Closing Alert for Industrial Mid Market

criteriaItems.value: Fleet IS AE2 EMEA,Fleet IS AE3 EMEA

rules.formula: IF( AND( OR( TEXT(StageName)='Closing', TEXT(StageName)='Refunded - Closed', TEXT(StageName)='Orders Processing' ), TEXT(Owner.Level__c)='AE 1' ),true,false)

rules.fullName: Closing Alert for sites AE%27s and Their Managers

rules.description: Connected Site Products Notification
alert to finance when deactivated trial has been approved for extension

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 7) AND (5 AND 6)

rules.fullName: Email Alert for Industrial Manufacturing opportunities in Trial %2B stages
rules.description: Send email to MA CSM and PM for Manufacturing Analytics opportunities in Trial + stages

rules.fullName: Email Alert for Large Hardware Deals %28%3E5000 HW Units%29
rules.description: Send email to PM team when Opportunity reaches Decision Stage and has total hardware greater than 5000 units

rules.fullName: Email Alert on a Trial Opportunity with IG Products
rules.description: This workflow rule is to trigger email alert when opportunity has IG product in it

rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Closing")), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closing"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Revenue Opportunity"), Swap__c = True )
AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "End of Life")), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"End of Life") )

rules.description: Enterprise notified of Connected Worker Free Trials
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Free Trial Opportunity'), ISPICKVAL(Xactly_Opportunity_Segment__c, 'Connected Worker'), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Orders Processing'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closing')), ISPICKVAL(Owner.Segment__c, 'Enterprise'))

rules.description: To notify Industrial Sales Ops when a remorse refund is created off of an Industrial opportunity

Email letting AE and AE Manager an opportunity was moved from closing to purchase due to "Kickback reason". AE will need to fix the opportunity based on the suggested resolution and move back to closing.

Email letting Sites AE (Product Specialist) and their Manager an opportunity was moved from closing to purchase due to "Kickback reason". AE will need to fix the opportunity based on the suggested resolution and move back to closing.

rules.fullName: Notification for Amount Changes at Orders Processing
rules.description: Notification for Amount Changes at Orders Processing
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName ,"Orders Processing"), Probability = 98), ISCHANGED( Amount ) )

rules.fullName: Notification for Amount Changes at Ready to Ship
rules.description: Notification for Amount Changes at Ready to Ship
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName ,"Ready to Ship"), Probability = 99), ISCHANGED( Amount ) , ISPICKVAL( Type , "Revenue Opportunity") )

rules.fullName: Oppty%3A Accounts that need to be corrected
rules.description: This workflow rule will be for accounts that need to be fixed in order for the new billing process for SMB.
rules.formula: And( Payment_Token__c <> null, CONTAINS(Segment__c, "AE1"), NOT(Account.New_Billing_Process_Approved__c), NOT(First_Purchase__c) )

rules.fullName: Oppty%3A Accounts that need to be corrected Mid Market
rules.description: This workflow rule will be for accounts that need to be fixed in order for the new billing process for Mid Market.
rules.formula: And( Payment_Token__c <> null, CONTAINS(Segment__c, "Mid Market"), CONTAINS(Payment_Type__c,"Samsara Financed"), CONTAINS(Entity_Copy__c, "Samsara US"), NOT(Account.New_Billing_Process_Approved__c), NOT(First_Purchase__c) )

rules.fullName: Oppty%3A Accounts that need to be corrected Mid Market UK
rules.description: This workflow rule will be for accounts that need to be fixed in order for the new billing process for Mid Market for UK.
rules.formula: And( Payment_Token__c <> null, CONTAINS(Segment__c, "Mid Market"), CONTAINS(Payment_Type__c,"Samsara Financed"), NOT(CONTAINS(Entity_Copy__c, "Samsara US")), NOT(Account.New_Billing_Process_Approved__c), NOT(First_Purchase__c) )
AND(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Revenue Opportunity'), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c, 'Paid Pilot'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'))
AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Sub_Type__c, 'Auto-Renewal')), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Ready to Ship'))

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9
rules.description: Send renewal email to express deals 30 and 5 days before license end date

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8
rules.description:
Send renewal email on days 88, 30 and 5 before the license end date expiration.
Edited per: GTMS-5678

rules.formula: $User.Id = OwnerId && TEXT( StageName ) = 'Return Cancelled' && TEXT( Type ) = 'Remorse Refund' && !Bypass_return_Email__c

rules.description: Alerts orders when a return label should be sent to customer for products to be returned.

rules.fullName: Return Opportunity Created and email alert sent
Send Email if ENT opp stage changes
rules.formula: AND(ISCHANGED(StageName), ACV_Bookings_SOT__c >= 50000, Owner_Role_Copy__c == "Fleet ENT AE EMEA UK", ISPICKVAL(Type, "Revenue Opportunity") )

rules.description: Triggers a time-based update to set the Closed Locked Date for 5 days after the Closed Won Date. This is used to lock down any changes to a closed won revenue opportunity after Netsuite has made all required updates.

rules.formula: (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(StageName)) && Amount >= 15000 && Probability >= 50/100 && (CloseDate <= TODAY() + 90)

rules.fullName: alert for sales when a free trial is nearing deactivation
rules.description: When the Trial Number of Days Left is -25 on the free trial oppty, we should send out an email alert to opportunity owner.

rules.formula: ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(Name) || ISCHANGED(Amount) || ISCHANGED(StageName)
